name: FinderYou
0:
”Alexa, set the light to thirty percent”
”Alexa, close the blinds”
”Alexa, turn up the temperature”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Control YESLY and Bliss devices with Alexa. 
In particular, you can:
switch on and switch off lights
-control light intensity
-manage electrical shutters 
-control the temperature based on the smart thermostat

Devices related to this app are Bliss and Finder YESLY device (actuators 13 series, bliss range device, dimmer 15 series). 
To use all the core functionalities you just need to log in with your Finder account that has been created when you set up the Finder products of your smart home. 

You can always find additional info on findernet website.
